front.title: Problem statement on the cross-realm operation of Kerberos in a specific system

abstract.t: There are some issues when the cross-realm operation of the Kerberos Version 5 [RFC4120] is employed into the specific systems. This document describes some manners of the real example, and lists requirements of the operation in such real system. Then it clarifies issues when we apply the cross-realm operation to such specific system.
